amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert an exception for regulations proposed by the Occupational Safety and Health Administration to prevent combustible dust explosions and fires.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 113-361 to exempt regulations proposed by the Occupational Safety and Health Administration to prevent combustible dust explosions and fires.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 229 (Roll no. 75).

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Miller, George.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Miller, George.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 229 (Roll no. 75).
